mapper.select:
/* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.selectTrnpMdfyList */
SELECT A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , A.JRSD_ORGN_CD /** Code D'Unité Compétente !== 관할조직코드 ==! */ , A.MDFY_DGCNT /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ , A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD /** Code de catégorie de rectification du transfert !== 운송정정구분코드 ==! */ , BL.CAG_MGMT_NO /** Crn !== 화물관리번호 ==! */ , BL.BL_NO /** N° De Bl !== BL번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_TP_CD /** Code de type de transfert !== 운송구분코드 ==! */ , A.TRNP_MEAN_CD /** Code de mode de transport !== 운송방법코드 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.DPTR_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') AS DPTR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Départ !== Date Et Heure De Départ ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.ARVL_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') AS ARVL_DTTM /** Date Et Heure D'Arrivée !== Date Et Heure D'Arrivée ==! */ , A.TRNP_PATH_CN /** Contenu De L'Itinéraire Du Transport !== 운송경로내용 ==! */ , A.DPRP_CSTM_CD /** Code De Bureau De Départ !== 출발지세관코드 ==! */ , A.ARLC_CSTM_CD /** Bureau De Destination !== 도착지세관코드 ==! */ , A.DPRP_IBOBZ_CD /** Code De Zone Sous Douane De Départ !== 출발지보세구역코드 ==! */ , (SELECT IBOBZ_NM FROM TB_CARI_IBOBZ B WHERE B.IBOBZ_CD = A.DPRP_IBOBZ_CD) AS DPRP_IBOBZ_NM , A.ARLC_IBOBZ_CD /** Code De Zone Sous Douane De Destination !== 도착지보세구역코드 ==! */ , (SELECT IBOBZ_NM FROM TB_CARI_IBOBZ B WHERE B.IBOBZ_CD = A.ARLC_IBOBZ_CD) AS ARLC_IBOBZ_NM , A.HDCB_YN /** Hydrocarbon O/N !== 탄화수소여부 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.trsn_dttm, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS TRSN_DTTM /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */ , A.TRSN_CO_CD /** Code d'entreprise transmettrice !== 전송업체코드 ==! */ , B.AUDT_EMP_ID /** ID de l'insepcteur !== 심사직원ID ==! */ , B.AUDT_EMP_NM /** Nom du l'insepcteur !== 심사직원명 ==! */ , B.PRCS_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Traitement !== 처리일시 ==! */ , (SELECT MAX(PRCS_STTS_CD) FROM TB_CARI_CAG_PRCS_BRKD Z WHERE Z.CAG_RQST_NO = A.TRNP_RQST_NO AND Z.RQST_DGCNT = A.MDFY_DGCNT AND Z.DEL_YN = 'N') AS PRCS_STTS_CD , A.DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_CHG_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ , B.CAG_RQST_TP_CD /** Code de type de demTCCPB.de fret !== 화물신청구분코드 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S.TRNP_RQST_NO , ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(S.CAG_MGMT_NO), ',') AS CAG_MGMT_NO , ARRAY_TO_STRING(ARRAY_AGG(S.BL_NO), ',') AS BL_NO FROM (SELECT TBL.CAG_MGMT_NO /** Crn !== 화물관리번호 ==! */ , TBL.BL_NO /** N° De Bl !== BL번호 ==! */ , TBL.TRNP_RQST_NO FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_BL TBL WHERE TBL.DEL_YN = 'N' /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ ) S GROUP BY TRNP_RQST_NO ) BL ON BL.TRNP_RQST_NO = A.TRNP_RQST_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TCCPB.CAG_RQST_NO /** N° De Demande De Cargaison !== 화물신청번호 ==! */ , TCCPB.CAG_RQST_TP_CD /** Code de type de demTCCPB.de fret !== 화물신청구분코드 ==! */ , TCCPB.RQST_DGCNT /** N° ordre de lTCCPB.demTCCPB.de !== 신청차수 ==! */ , TCCPB.JRSD_ORGN_CD /** Code D'Unité Compétente !== 관할조직코드 ==! */ , TCCPB.TRNP_TP_CD /** Code de type de trTCCPB.sfert !== 운송구분코드 ==! */ , TCCPB.IBOBZ_CD /** Code de zone sous douTCCPB.e !== 보세구역코드 ==! */ , TCCPB.PRCS_STTS_CD /** Code De StTCCPB.ut De TrTCCPB.tement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(TCCPB.PRCS_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS PRCS_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Traitement !== 처리일시 ==! */ , TCCPB.HNOT_EMP_ID /** ID du chTCCPB.gé de cotTCCPB.ion !== 배부직원ID ==! */ , TCCPB.AUDT_EMP_ID /** ID de l'insepcteur !== 심사직원ID ==! */ , TPE.EMP_FMNM || ' ' || TPE.EMP_NM AS AUDT_EMP_NM /** ID de l'insepcteur !== 심사직원ID ==! */ , TCCPB.INSC_EMP_ID /** ID de l'vérificTCCPB.eur !== 검사직원ID ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_CAG_PRCS_BRKD TCCPB LEFT JOIN TB_POTI_EMP TPE ON TPE.PBSR_NO = TCCPB.AUDT_EMP_ID WHERE TCCPB.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TPE.DEL_YN = 'N' ) B ON A.TRNP_RQST_NO = B.CAG_RQST_NO AND B.CAG_RQST_TP_CD = 'MMG' AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = B.RQST_DGCNT /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ AND B.RQST_DGCNT != 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT K1.CO_NM , K1.RPRS_TLPH_NO , K1.CO_ADDR , K2.CO_DCLR_CD FROM TB_COM_CO K1 , TB_COM_CO_DCLR_CD K2 WHERE K1.NIF = K2.NIF AND K1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND K2.DEL_YN = 'N' AND K2.RQST_TP_CD IN ('01','02') /* 신규나/수정 상태*/ AND K2.PRCS_STTS_CD = 'O' /* 업체 승인상태 */ AND K2.USE_YN = 'Y' /* 사용여부 */ ) C ON A.TRSN_CO_CD = C.CO_DCLR_CD WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.MDFY_DGCNT != 0
AND ( ( A.TRSN_DTTM >= TO_DATE(#{searchKeywordFrom}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */ AND A.TRSN_DTTM <= TO_DATE(#{searchKeywordTo}, 'DD/MM/YYYY')+0.9999 /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */ ) OR ( A.LAST_CHG_DTTM >= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchKeywordFrom}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AND A.LAST_CHG_DTTM <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchKeywordTo}, 'DD/MM/YYYY')+0.9999 ) )
AND A.TRNP_TP_CD != '50'
AND B.PRCS_STTS_CD = #{prcsSttsCd} /** Code De Statut De Traitement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */
AND A.TRNP_TP_CD = #{trnpTpCd} /** Code de type de transfert !== 운송구분코드 ==! */
AND A.TRNP_MEAN_CD = #{trnpMeanCd} /** Code de mode de transport !== 운송방법코드 ==! */
AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_BL TCTB WHERE TCTB.TRNP_RQST_NO = A.TRNP_RQST_NO AND TCTB.CAG_MGMT_NO LIKE '%'||#{cagMgmtNo}||'%' /** Crn !== 화물관리번호 ==! */ )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_BL TCTB WHERE TCTB.TRNP_RQST_NO = A.TRNP_RQST_NO AND TCTB.BL_NO LIKE '%'||#{blNo}||'%' /** N° De Bl !== BL번호 ==! */ )
AND B.PRCS_STTS_CD IN ('B02', 'D02', 'D08', 'D09')
AND B.PRCS_STTS_CD IN ('D01', 'B02', 'D08', 'D09')
AND B.AUDT_EMP_ID = #{pbsrNo}
AND A.JRSD_ORGN_CD LIKE SUBSTR(#{jrsdOrgnCd}, 1, 5) || '%'
ORDER BY B.PRCS_DTTM DESC

/* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.selectTrnpMdfy */ WITH BEFORE_LAST_MDFY_DGCNT_TB AS ( SELECT MAX(A.MDFY_DGCNT) AS BEFORE_LAST_MDFY_DGCNT FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY A , TB_CARI_CAG_PRCS_BRKD B WHERE A.TRNP_RQST_NO = B.CAG_RQST_NO /** N° de Demander la rectification de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = B.RQST_DGCNT /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} AND A.MDFY_DGCNT <> #{mdfyDgcnt} AND B.PRCS_STTS_CD IN ('D08') AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' ) , ORGN_TB AS ( SELECT C1.ORGN_CD , C2.ORGN_CD JRSD_CSTM_CD FROM TB_POTI_ORGN C1 LEFT JOIN TB_POTI_ORGN C2 ON C1.UPR_ORGN_MGMT_CD = C2.ORGN_MGMT_CD WHERE C1.DEL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de Demander la rectification de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , (SELECT Z.JRSD_CSTM_CD FROM ORGN_TB Z WHERE Z.ORGN_CD = A.JRSD_ORGN_CD) as JRSD_CSTM_CD /** Bureau compétent !== 관할세관 */ , (SELECT ORGN_NM FROM TB_POTI_ORGN WHERE ORGN_CD = (SELECT Z.JRSD_CSTM_CD FROM ORGN_TB Z WHERE Z.ORGN_CD = A.JRSD_ORGN_CD)) AS JRSD_CSTM_NM /** Bureau compétent !== 관할세관명 */ , A.JRSD_ORGN_CD /** Code D'Unité Compétente !== 관할조직코드 ==! */ , (SELECT ORGN_NM FROM TB_POTI_ORGN WHERE ORGN_CD = A.JRSD_ORGN_CD) AS JRSD_ORGN_NM /** Code D'Unité Compétente !== 관할조직명 ==! */ , A.MDFY_DGCNT /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ , NVL((SELECT BEFORE_LAST_MDFY_DGCNT FROM BEFORE_LAST_MDFY_DGCNT_TB), 0) AS BF_MDFY_DGCNT , A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD /** Code de catégorie de rectification du transfert !== 운송정정구분코드 ==! */ , A.MDFY_RSN_CN /** Motif de rectification !== 정정사유내용 ==! */ , A.TRNP_TP_CD /** Code de type de transfert !== 운송구분코드 ==! */ , A.TRNP_MEAN_CD /** Code de mode de transport !== 운송방법코드 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.DPTR_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') AS DPTR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Départ !== Date Et Heure De Départ ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.ARVL_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') AS ARVL_DTTM /** Date Et Heure D'Arrivée !== Date Et Heure D'Arrivée ==! */ , A.TRNP_PATH_CN /** Contenu De L'Itinéraire Du Transport !== 운송경로내용 ==! */ , (SELECT Z.JRSD_CSTM_CD FROM ORGN_TB Z WHERE Z.ORGN_CD = A.DPRP_CSTM_CD) as DPRP_JRSD_ORGN_CD /** Code De Bureau De Départ !== 출발지세관코드 ==! */ , (SELECT ORGN_NM FROM TB_POTI_ORGN WHERE ORGN_CD = (SELECT Z.JRSD_CSTM_CD FROM ORGN_TB Z WHERE Z.ORGN_CD = A.DPRP_CSTM_CD)) AS DPRP_JRSD_ORGN_NM /** Code De Bureau De Départ !== 출발지세관명 ==! */ , A.DPRP_CSTM_CD /** Service de départ !== 출발지조직 */ , (SELECT ORGN_NM FROM TB_POTI_ORGN WHERE ORGN_CD = A.DPRP_CSTM_CD) AS DPRP_CSTM_NM /** Service de départ !== 출발지조직명 */ , (SELECT Z.JRSD_CSTM_CD FROM ORGN_TB Z WHERE Z.ORGN_CD = A.ARLC_CSTM_CD) as ARLC_JRSD_ORGN_CD /** Bureau De Destination !== 도착지세관코드 ==! */ , (SELECT ORGN_NM FROM TB_POTI_ORGN WHERE ORGN_CD = (SELECT Z.JRSD_CSTM_CD FROM ORGN_TB Z WHERE Z.ORGN_CD = A.ARLC_CSTM_CD)) AS ARLC_JRSD_ORGN_NM /** Bureau De Destination !== 도착지세관명 ==! */ , A.ARLC_CSTM_CD /** Service de dest. !== 도착지조직 ==! */ , (SELECT ORGN_NM FROM TB_POTI_ORGN WHERE ORGN_CD = A.ARLC_CSTM_CD) AS ARLC_CSTM_NM /** Service de dest. !== 도착지조직명 ==! */ , A.DPRP_IBOBZ_CD /** Code De Zone Sous Douane De Départ !== 출발지보세구역코드 ==! */ , (SELECT IBOBZ_NM FROM TB_CARI_IBOBZ B WHERE B.IBOBZ_CD = A.DPRP_IBOBZ_CD) AS DPRP_IBOBZ_NM , A.ARLC_IBOBZ_CD /** Code De Zone Sous Douane De Destination !== 도착지보세구역코드 ==! */ , (SELECT IBOBZ_NM FROM TB_CARI_IBOBZ B WHERE B.IBOBZ_CD = A.ARLC_IBOBZ_CD) AS ARLC_IBOBZ_NM , A.HDCB_YN /** Hydrocarbon O/N !== 탄화수소여부 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.trsn_dttm, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS TRSN_DTTM /** Date et heure de transmission !== 전송일시 ==! */ , A.TRSN_CO_CD /** Code d'entreprise transmettrice !== 전송업체코드 ==! */ , B.AUDT_EMP_ID /** ID de l'insepcteur !== 심사직원ID ==! */ , B.AUDT_EMP_NM /** Nom du l'insepcteur !== 심사직원명 ==! */ , A.AUDT_PT_CD /** Code De Type De Contrôle !== 심사유형코드 ==! */ , A.AUDT_RSLT_CN /** Contenu Du Résultat De La Vérification !== 심사결과내용 ==! */ , B.PRCS_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Traitement !== 처리일시 ==! */ , (SELECT MAX(PRCS_STTS_CD) FROM TB_CARI_CAG_PRCS_BRKD Z WHERE Z.CAG_RQST_NO = A.TRNP_RQST_NO AND Z.RQST_DGCNT = A.MDFY_DGCNT AND Z.DEL_YN = 'N') AS PRCS_STTS_CD , A.DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_CHG_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ , A.MDFY_RSN_CN /** Motif de rectification !== 정정사유내용 ==! */ , (SELECT D.REGN_NM FROM TB_COM_REGN_CD C, TB_COM_REGN_CD_LANG D WHERE C.REGN_CD = D.REGN_CD AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.REGN_CD = A.DPTR_PORT_CD AND D.LANG_CD = #{langCd}) AS DPTR_PORT_NM , (SELECT D.REGN_NM FROM TB_COM_REGN_CD C, TB_COM_REGN_CD_LANG D WHERE C.REGN_CD = D.REGN_CD AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND D.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.REGN_CD = A.LDUN_PORT_CD AND D.LANG_CD = #{langCd}) AS LDUN_PORT_NM , B.CAG_RQST_TP_CD /** Code de type de demTCCPB.de fret !== 화물신청구분코드 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TCCPB.CAG_RQST_NO /** N° De Demande De Cargaison !== 화물신청번호 ==! */ , TCCPB.CAG_RQST_TP_CD /** Code de type de demTCCPB.de fret !== 화물신청구분코드 ==! */ , TCCPB.RQST_DGCNT /** N° ordre de lTCCPB.demTCCPB.de !== 신청차수 ==! */ , TCCPB.JRSD_ORGN_CD /** Code D'Unité Compétente !== 관할조직코드 ==! */ , TCCPB.TRNP_TP_CD /** Code de type de trTCCPB.sfert !== 운송구분코드 ==! */ , TCCPB.IBOBZ_CD /** Code de zone sous douTCCPB.e !== 보세구역코드 ==! */ , TCCPB.PRCS_STTS_CD /** Code De StTCCPB.ut De TrTCCPB.tement !== 처리상태코드 ==! */ , TO_CHAR(TCCPB.PRCS_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS PRCS_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Traitement !== 처리일시 ==! */ , TCCPB.HNOT_EMP_ID /** ID du chTCCPB.gé de cotTCCPB.ion !== 배부직원ID ==! */ , TCCPB.AUDT_EMP_ID /** ID de l'insepcteur !== 심사직원ID ==! */ , TPE.EMP_FMNM || ' ' || TPE.EMP_NM AS AUDT_EMP_NM /** ID de l'insepcteur !== 심사직원ID ==! */ , TCCPB.INSC_EMP_ID /** ID de l'vérificTCCPB.eur !== 검사직원ID ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_CAG_PRCS_BRKD TCCPB LEFT JOIN TB_POTI_EMP TPE ON TPE.PBSR_NO = TCCPB.AUDT_EMP_ID WHERE TCCPB.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TPE.DEL_YN = 'N' ) B ON A.TRNP_RQST_NO = B.CAG_RQST_NO AND B.CAG_RQST_TP_CD = 'MMG' AND B.RQST_DGCNT = A.MDFY_DGCNT WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de Demander la rectification de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = #{mdfyDgcnt} /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */
AND A.FRST_REGST_ID = #{userId} /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */

/* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.selectTrnpMdfyBlList */ SELECT A.BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de Demander la rectification de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , A.MDFY_DGCNT /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ , A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD /** Code de catégorie de rectification du transfert !== 운송정정구분코드 ==! */ , A.CAG_MGMT_NO /** Crn !== 화물관리번호 ==! */ , A.BL_NO /** N° De Bl !== BL번호 ==! */ , A.PDLS_NM /** Nom De L'Article !== 품목명 ==! */ , A.PCKG_GCNT /** Nombre De Colis !== 포장개수 ==! */ , A.WGHT /** Poids !== 중량 ==! */ , B.PCKG_GCNT AS RPRT_PCKG_GCNT/** Nbr de colis dans le rapport !== 보고포장개수 ==! */ , B.TTWG AS RPRT_TTWG /** Poids brut dans le rapport !== 보고총중량 ==! */ , NVL(Z.CNTR_CNT,0) AS CNTR_CNT , A.DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_CHG_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ , A.RELA_NO FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_BL A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CARI_CAG_DCSH_BL B ON B.CAG_MGMT_NO=NVL(A.CAG_MGMT_NO,' ') AND B.DEL_YN='N'
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Z.CNTR_NO) AS CNTR_CNT , X.EXP_CMDT_BRNG_RQNO/** N° De Conteneur !== 컨테이너번호 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_EXP_CMDT_BRNG_CNTR Z LEFT JOIN TB_CARI_EXP_CMDT_BRNG X ON X.EXP_CMDT_BRNG_RQNO = Z.EXP_CMDT_BRNG_RQNO WHERE Z.DEL_YN = 'N' AND X.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY X.EXP_CMDT_BRNG_RQNO ) Z ON Z.EXP_CMDT_BRNG_RQNO = A.RELA_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Z.CNTR_NO) AS CNTR_CNT , X.CAG_MGMT_NO/** N° De Conteneur !== 컨테이너번호 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_CAG_DCSH_BL_CNTR Z LEFT JOIN TB_CARI_CAG_DCSH_BL X ON X.CAG_MGMT_NO = Z.CAG_MGMT_NO AND X.MRN = Z.MRN WHERE Z.DEL_YN = 'N' AND X.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY X.CAG_MGMT_NO ) Z ON Z.CAG_MGMT_NO = A.CAG_MGMT_NO
WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de Demander la rectification de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = #{mdfyDgcnt} /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */
AND NVL(A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD,'') NOT IN ('70')
ORDER BY A.BL_SRNO

/* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.selectTrnpMdfyCntrList */ SELECT A.CNTR_SRNO /** N° De Séquence Du Conteneur !== 컨테이너일련번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de Demander la rectification de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , A.MDFY_DGCNT /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ , A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD /** Code de catégorie de rectification du transfert !== 운송정정구분코드 ==! */ , D.BL_NO , A.CARR_SRNO /** N° De Wagon !== 왜건번호 ==! */ , A.BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_METH_SRNO /** N° De Série De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단일련번호 ==! */ , A.CNTR_NO /** N° De Conteneur !== 컨테이너번호 ==! */ , A.CNTR_TP_CD /** Code De Type De Conteneur !== 컨테이너구분코드 ==! */ , A.SEAL_NO1 /** N° De Scellé1 !== 봉인번호1 ==! */ , A.SEAL_CHPN1 /** Responsable de scellé 1 !== 봉인담당자1 ==! */ , A.SEAL_NO2 /** N° De Scellé2 !== 봉인번호2 ==! */ , A.SEAL_CHPN2 /** Responsable de scellé 2 !== 봉인담당자2 ==! */ , A.SEAL_NO3 /** N° De Scellé3 !== 봉인번호3 ==! */ , A.SEAL_CHPN3 /** Responsable de scellé 3 !== 봉인담당자3 ==! */ , A.PCKG_GCNT /** Nombre De Colis !== 포장개수 ==! */ , A.PCKG_UT_CD /** Code De L'Unité De Colis !== 포장단위코드 ==! */ , A.ECNTR_WGHT /** Tare De Conteneur(S) À Vide !== 공컨테이너중량 ==! */ , A.WGHT /** Poids !== 중량 ==! */ , A.DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_RGSR_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , TO_CHAR(A.LAST_CHG_DTTM, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_CNTR A , TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_METH B , TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_CARR C , TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_BL D
, TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_TRLR TT
, TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_WGN TW
WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.BL_SRNO = B.BL_SRNO AND A.CARR_SRNO = B.CARR_SRNO AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = B.TRNP_RQST_NO AND A.TRNP_METH_SRNO = B.TRNP_METH_SRNO AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = B.MDFY_DGCNT AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BL_SRNO = C.BL_SRNO AND A.CARR_SRNO = C.CARR_SRNO AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = C.TRNP_RQST_NO AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = C.MDFY_DGCNT AND C.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.BL_SRNO = D.BL_SRNO AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = D.TRNP_RQST_NO AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = D.MDFY_DGCNT AND D.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.TRLR_SRNO = TT.TRLR_SRNO AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = TT.TRNP_RQST_NO AND A.TRNP_METH_SRNO = TT.TRNP_METH_SRNO AND A.CARR_SRNO = TT.CARR_SRNO AND A.BL_SRNO = TT.BL_SRNO AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = TT.MDFY_DGCNT AND TT.DEL_YN='N'
AND A.WGN_SRNO = TW.WGN_SRNO AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = TW.TRNP_RQST_NO AND A.TRNP_METH_SRNO = TW.TRNP_METH_SRNO AND A.CARR_SRNO = TW.CARR_SRNO AND A.BL_SRNO = TW.BL_SRNO AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = TW.MDFY_DGCNT AND TW.DEL_YN='N'
AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de Demander la rectification de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */
AND A.BL_SRNO = #{blSrno}
AND A.CARR_SRNO = #{carrSrno}
AND A.TRNP_METH_SRNO = #{trnpMethSrno} /** N° De Série De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단일련번호 ==! */
AND A.TRLR_SRNO = #{trlrSrno} /** N° D'Immatriculation De Remorque !== 트레일러차량등록번호 ==! */
AND A.WGN_SRNO = #{wgnSrno} /** N° De Wagon !== 왜건번호 ==! */
AND NVL(A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD,'') NOT IN ('70')
AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = #{mdfyDgcnt} /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ ORDER BY A.CNTR_SRNO
mapper.update: /* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.updateTrnpMdfyPrcsSttsCd */ UPDATE TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY SET AUDT_DTTM = TO_DATE(#{audtDttm}, 'DDMMYYYYHH24MISS') /** Date De L'Étude !== 심사일시 ==! */ , AUDT_PT_CD = #{audtPtCd} /** Code De Type De Contrôle !== 심사유형코드 ==! */ , AUDT_RSLT_CN = #{audtRsltCn} /** Contenu Du Résultat De La Vérification !== 심사결과내용 ==! */ , LAST_CHPR_ID = #{lastChprId} /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , LAST_CHG_DTTM = SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ WHERE TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de Demander la rectification de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ AND MDFY_DGCNT = #{mdfyDgcnt} /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */
mapper.insert: /* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.insertTrnpBl */ INSERT INTO TB_CARI_TRNP_BL( BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , CAG_MGMT_NO /** Crn !== 화물관리번호 ==! */ , BL_NO /** N° De Bl !== BL번호 ==! */ , PDLS_NM /** Nom De L'Article !== 품목명 ==! */ , PCKG_GCNT /** Nombre De Colis !== 포장개수 ==! */ , WGHT /** Poids !== 중량 ==! */ , RELA_NO , MG_NO , DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ ) SELECT A.BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , A.CAG_MGMT_NO /** Crn !== 화물관리번호 ==! */ , A.BL_NO /** N° De Bl !== BL번호 ==! */ , A.PDLS_NM /** Nom De L'Article !== 품목명 ==! */ , A.PCKG_GCNT /** Nombre De Colis !== 포장개수 ==! */ , A.WGHT /** Poids !== 중량 ==! */ , A.RELA_NO , A.MG_NO , A.DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , A.FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , A.LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_BL A WHERE A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = #{mdfyDgcnt} /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD != #{trnpMdfyTpCd}

/* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.insertTrnpCarr */ INSERT INTO TB_CARI_TRNP_CARR ( BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , CARR_SRNO , TRNP_RQST_NO , CARR_CD , CARR_NIF , CARR_NM , CARR_ADDR_NM , DEL_YN , FRST_REGST_ID , FRST_RGSR_DTTM , LAST_CHPR_ID , LAST_CHG_DTTM) SELECT A.BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , A.CARR_SRNO , A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , A.CARR_CD , A.CARR_NIF , A.CARR_NM , A.CARR_ADDR_NM , A.DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , A.FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , A.LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_CARR A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = #{mdfyDgcnt} /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD != #{trnpMdfyTpCd}

/* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.insertTrnpMeth */ INSERT INTO TB_CARI_TRNP_METH ( TRNP_METH_SRNO , BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , CARR_SRNO , TRNP_RQST_NO , TRNP_METH_PT_CD , TRNP_METH_NM , TRNP_METH_IDFY_NO , TRNP_RFER_NO , TRNP_METH_NAT_CD , IMO_NO , SHIP_TTN , SHIP_NTTN , DRVR_NM , NTNAL_IDFY_NO , LCNE_NO , PSPR_NO , DEL_YN , FRST_REGST_ID , FRST_RGSR_DTTM , LAST_CHPR_ID , LAST_CHG_DTTM) SELECT A.TRNP_METH_SRNO /** N° De Série De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단일련번호 ==! */ , A.BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , A.CARR_SRNO , A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_METH_PT_CD /** Type De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단유형코드 ==! */ , A.TRNP_METH_NM /** Nom De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단명 ==! */ , A.TRNP_METH_IDFY_NO /** N° D'Identification Du Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단식별번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_RFER_NO /** N° de référence de transport !== 운송참고번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_METH_NAT_CD /** Code de nationalité du moyen de transport !== 운송수단국적코드 ==! */ , A.IMO_NO /** N° IMO !== IMO번호 ==! */ , A.SHIP_TTN /** Tonnage Brut Du Navire !== 선박총톤수 ==! */ , A.SHIP_NTTN /** Tonnage Net Du Navire !== 선박순톤수 ==! */ , A.DRVR_NM /** Nom de conducteur !== 운전자명 ==! */ , A.NTNAL_IDFY_NO /** Nin !== 자국민식별번호 ==! */ , A.LCNE_NO /** N° permis de conduire !== 면허번호 ==! */ , A.PSPR_NO /** N° De Passeport !== 여권번호 ==! */ , A.DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , A.FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , A.LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_METH A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = #{mdfyDgcnt} /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD != #{trnpMdfyTpCd}

/* alpass.ipt.car.trnpcvy.trnp.mapper.CarTrnpMdfyMapper.insertTrnpWgn */ INSERT INTO TB_CARI_TRNP_WGN ( WGN_SRNO /** N° série de wagon !== 왜건일련번호 ==! */ , TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , CARR_SRNO , TRNP_METH_SRNO /** N° De Série De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단일련번호 ==! */ , WGN_NO /** N° De Wagon !== 왜건번호 ==! */ , WGN_TYPE /** type de wagon !== 왜건타입 ==! */ , DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ ) SELECT A.WGN_SRNO /** N° série de wagon !== 왜건일련번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , A.BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , A.CARR_SRNO , A.TRNP_METH_SRNO /** N° De Série De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단일련번호 ==! */ , A.WGN_NO /** N° De Wagon !== 왜건번호 ==! */ , A.WGN_TYPE /** type de wagon !== 왜건타입 ==! */ , A.DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.FRST_REGST_ID /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , A.FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , A.LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ FROM TB_CARI_TRNP_MDFY_WGN A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_RQST_NO = #{trnpRqstNo} /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ AND A.MDFY_DGCNT = #{mdfyDgcnt} /** Fréquence de rectification !== 정정차수 ==! */ AND A.TRNP_MDFY_TP_CD != #{trnpMdfyTpCd}

*/ , FRST_RGSR_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , LAST_CHPR_ID /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , LAST_CHG_DTTM /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ ) SELECT A.TRLR_SRNO /** Numéro de série de la remorque !== 트레일러일련번호 ==! */ , A.TRNP_RQST_NO /** N° de demande de transfert !== 운송신청번호 ==! */ , A.BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , A.CARR_SRNO , A.TRNP_METH_SRNO /** N° De Série De Moyen De Transport !== 운송수단일련번호 ==! */ , A.TRLR_VHCL_RGSR_NO /** N° D'Immatriculation De Remorque !== 트레일러차량등록번호 ==! */ , A.TRLR_SSIS_NO /** N° Châssis De Remorque !== 트레일러샤시번호 ==! */ , A.TRLR_STSZ /** Gabarit De Remorque !== 트레일러규격 ==! */ , BL_SRNO /** N° De Séquence De Bl !== BL일련번호 ==! */ , CARR_SRNO , WGN_SRNO /** N° série de wagon !== 왜건일련번호 ==! */ , TRLR_SRNO /** Numéro de série de la remorque !== 트레일러일련번호 ==! */ , ELCT_SEAL_NO , ELCT_SEAL_NO_MNTN_DTTM , ELCT_SEAL_NO_MNTN_CHPN , DEL_YN /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==!
